not so knobbly this week but nice for a facecloth perhaps you will need oddments of dk weight cotton yarn a 3 50 mm hook and a needle for neatening ends gauge 20sts to 10 cm 4 in pattern uk pattern commence with 40ch add/subtract multiples of 2ch to vary width row 1 2dc in 2nd chain from hook *miss next st 2dc in next st repeat from * to end turn row 2 miss first st 2dc in next st *miss next st 2dc in next st repeat from * across turn -
